ATTRACT, DEVELOP, RETAIN Workforce Solutions (ADR) is a national Technical, Professional and Executive Staffing Company focused on being an honest partner who understands your urgency in hiring top talent to each of your organizations.Our HR Consulting group has Certified SHRM-SCP consultants ready to assist your organization on a project basis.Our Workforce Solutions Consultants have exclusive networks of candidates and C-Level contacts that allow us to find the right skill and culture fit for your organization.

Deliver strategic and tactical recruiting support for a large number of fortune 500 clients in the Western United States. Handle well over 150 FT contract and FT IT/Engineering and Professional positions.Grew revenue to $13mm PLUS in 5 years.Our areas of expertise include IT, Engineering and Telecommunications.  Our workforce solutions provide a wide array of business solutions for your rapidly changing needs.

recommendations: Rapid Continuous Improvement Manager at Dr Pepper Snapple Group
March 22, 2016, Shane was a client of Jason’s

I met Jason at a time when I was a bit reluctant to make the next career move.  However, when we spoke I quickly realized I better take another look at the opportunity he had aligned my resume and experience with.  The open role fit both my career plan and job expectations to a T.  At the time Jason was working on behalf of my current employer, but throughout the process he represented both their and my best interests in a way that led to a decision to move forward and accept the new role.  Looking back 12 months later I can definitely say it was an equitable and mutually beneficial decision for both the company and me.

October 4, 2011, Gil "GW" was a client of Jason’s

I've know and worked with Jason for almost 7 years now.  He's very professional with high business ethics, integrity and possesses a very easy-going and approachable personality. His insight and knowledge of the technology consulting business is unsurpassed by many who have been in this industry a lot longer.  We've had many engaging conversation on future industry trends and the "technology people" needed for to support those trends.  Our relationship has grown from a professional to a personal level and I'm proud to consider Jason as part of my business "inner circle".

I have had the pleasure of working with Jason Pierse at Kelly Services for nearly 4 years.  As a colleague and peer, I have found Jason to be a well rounded District Manager.  He has excellent operation skills balanced with sales ability.  He knows his customers and has an impeccable ability to provide them with the staffing solution that they require. summary: I am currently working with numerous exclusive clients in Phoenix, Dallas, Houston, San Diego, LA, and San Francisco looking to ATTRACT high level employees to their organization.  Our large network of highly experienced candidates(Technical/Professional & C-Level) are currently engaged with our team to assist them in their next career move.  We have 20+ years of experience in contract, perm and "Executive" search for all Technical, Professional and Executive careers. We will handle your search with the utmost confidentiality!If you are interested in pursuing FT/Contract or FT opportunities, please feel free to reach out to me.
